actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel, and that the U.S. Embassy in Israel should be relocated to Jerusalem.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the President and the Secretary of State should recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel and move the United States embassy in Israel to that city.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States should recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel, and that the U.S. Embassy in Israel should be relocated to Jerusalem.
